name: Wellspring of War-Lust
title: Eula: Wellspring of War-Lust
desc: Flood of frost will ensure that vengeance is mine.
inPlayDescription: When your Eula, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Icetide Vortex, this will generate 1 more Zeal for <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Lightfall Sword.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Eula to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Eula, equip this card.After Eula equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Glacial Illumination once.When your Eula, who has this card equipped, uses <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Icetide Vortex, this will generate 1 more Zeal for <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Lightfall Sword.(You must have Eula in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
